parameters.name: domainName
parameters.description: The domain name of the BasePathMapping resource to create.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

nested_items.name: basePath
nested_items.description: The base path name that callers of the API must provide as part of the URL after the domain name.

nested_items.description: The string identifier of the associated RestApi.

nested_items.name: stage
